PROJECTS




College Unite



A common platform for interaction between seniors and juniors of a college. Loads of features added to help make the communication fast and effective. A few features include automatic filtering of messages so that seniors don't get spammed with irrelavent queries, one to one chat feature, ability to ask doubts, resolve juniors' doubts, post advices, and lot more. CodeForces Info

An android application which helps you to get more insights of yours and your friends' codeforces profile. Loaded with many unique features which helps you to analyze your performance and identify your weak areas. 100+ downloads on playstore.
